page.title: 06N.DERBY:RELIGIOUS PRACTICE
page.content: RELIGIOUS PRACTICES IN THE ALLESTREE/ QUARNDON AREA;ACCORDING TO STATISTICS. ALL ARE{CHRISTIAN}CHURCHES/GROUPS OF VARIOUS DENOMINATIONS. QUARNDON HAS ONE CHURCH;ST.PAULS,{ANGLICAN.}2,250 PARISHIONERS:100 ATTEND EACH SUNDAY. ALLESTREE HAS TWO ANGLICAN CHURCHES. ONE IS ST.NICHOLAS'S;5,900 REGD. PARISHIONERS:110 ATTEND EACH SUNDAY. ONE{ROMAN CATHOLIC}CHURCH HOLY FAMILY; 400 PARISHIONERS. ONE{BAPTIST}CHURCH WITH 150 MEMBERS. TWO{METHODIST CHURCHES;ST.JOHN'S:217 MEMBERS THAT ATTEND;ALLESTREE VILLAGE METHODIST CHURCH WITH 34 MEMBERS. THEREFORE,OUT OF A POPULATION OF {11,941}IN THE ALLESTREE/QUARNDON AREA {1,011}ARE PRACTISING CHRISTIANS.
